item.title: Issues with Fleet Command service
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Fleet Command Service Issues

Users are experiencing issues with accessing UI pages in Fleet Command service. The problem has been identified to be local to Chrome users, and investigations are ongoing. Updates will be provided on the status page. Summary: The Fleet Command service is currently experiencing issues affecting user access to UI pages. The problem is being actively investigated.

Feb 28, 07:07 PST
Identified - The issues with Fleet Command service has been identified to be local to chrome users.

The issues are being actively investigated and updates will be posted on this status page.

Feb 28, 06:44 PST
Investigating - The Fleet Command service is currently experiencing issues which are affecting users ability to access UI pages.

The issues are being actively investigated and updates will be posted on this status page.

item.title: Customers will not be able to deploy functions.
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Deployment and Function Change Issue

Investigating an issue impacting customer ability to deploy and change functions.

Feb 21, 15:56 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue impacting customer ability to deploy and change functions.

item.title: NVCF Service Outage: All inferences are currently failing
item.content:encoded:
High - Incident Investigation

Summary: The company is currently investigating an issue impacting NVCF Service Inference Success, indicating a potentially high impact on users.

Jan 10, 16:34 PST
Resolved - The incident has been resolved and all functionality has been restored

Jan 10, 15:27 PST
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jan 10, 15:27 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue impacting NVCF Service Inference Success

item.title: Issues with NGC Core Services
item.content:encoded:
Dec 11, 13:52 PST
Resolved - Issues affecting the NGC Core Services have been resolved and the service is operating normally.

Dec 11, 11:40 PST
Monitoring - A fix for the NGC Core Services issues has been applied and we are monitoring the service for stability.

Dec 11, 10:11 PST
Investigating - The NGC core services are experiencing issues affecting the NGC API and impacting BaseCommand Platform, FleetCommand, Private Registry, and Catalog services.

The issues are actively being investigated and updates will be posted on this status page.

item.content:encoded:

Resolved - Issues affecting the NGC Core Services have been resolved and the service is operating normally.

Nov 30, 09:03 PST
Investigating - The NGC Core Services is currently experiencing issues with identity and access management.
Users may experience authentication issues with NGC API or user interface.

The issues are being actively investigated and updates will be posted on this status page.

item.title: Issues with NGC Catalog “Welcome Guest” drop-down menu
item.content:encoded:
May 2, 14:14 PDT
Resolved - Issues affecting the NGC Catalog service have been resolved and the service is operating normally.

May 2, 13:10 PDT
Monitoring - A fix for the NGC Catalog service issues has been applied and we are monitoring the service for stability.

May 2, 13:04 PDT
Identified - The cause of issues with NGC Catalog service has been identified and a fix is being applied.

May 2, 12:53 PDT
Investigating - The NGC Catalog service is currently experiencing issues with the “Welcome Guest” drop-down menu. Users cannot expand the drop-down menu and navigate to the NGC sign in page.

The workaround is to navigate directly to ngc.nvidia.com/signin

The issues are being actively investigated and updates will be posted on this status page.

item.title: Issues with Private Registry service
item.content:encoded:
Feb 28, 14:46 PST
Resolved - Issues affecting the Private Registry service have been resolved and the service is operating normally.

Feb 28, 13:47 PST
Monitoring - A fix for the Private Registry service issues has been applied and we are monitoring the service for stability.

Feb 24, 09:15 PST
Identified - The cause of issues with Private Registry service has been identified and a fix is being tested. Users should continue to use NGC CLI as a workaround.

Further updates will be posted on this status page.

Feb 23, 09:28 PST
Investigating - The Private Registry service is currently experiencing issues that are affecting users ability to upload Models and Resources to their repositories using NGC WebUI. Users are encouraged to use the NGC CLI as a workaround.

The issues are being actively investigated and updates will be posted on this status page.

item.title: Issues with Private Registry service
item.content:encoded:

Feb 10, 12:40 PST
Update - Issues with Private Registry service are still being investigated. Further updates will be posted on this status page.

Feb 10, 12:00 PST
Investigating - The Private Registry service is currently experiencing issues that are intermittently affecting users’ ability to push and manage container images using NGC WebUI and NGC CLI. Managing container images using Docker CLI is not impacted.

The issues are being actively investigated and updates will be posted on this status page.
